details.description_text: ক্রিস্টাল ক্লিয়ার ৮-কোণা কোক ও শরবত গ্লাস সেট – ৬ পিসআপনার গ্লাসওয়্যার সংগ্রহে আনুন আধুনিকতার ছোঁয়া এই ৮-কোণা কোক ও শরবত গ্লাস সেটের মাধ্যমে। ক্রিস্টাল ক্লিয়ার স্বচ্ছতা ও টেকসই গুণমানের সংমিশ্রণে তৈরি এই গ্লাসগুলো দৈনন্দিন ব্যবহার এবং বিশেষ মুহূর্তের জন্য আদর্শ।পণ্যের বৈশিষ্ট্য:✔ প্রিমিয়াম কোয়ালিটি গ্লাস – দীর্ঘস্থায়ী ও উচ্চমানের গ্লাস উপাদানে তৈরি।✔ আকর্ষণীয় ৮-কোণা ডিজাইন – টেবিল সেটআপে আনে আধুনিক ও স্টাইলিশ লুক।✔ বহুমুখী ব্যবহার – পানি, জুস, কোক, শরবত এবং অন্যান্য পানীয় পরিবেশনের জন্য উপযুক্ত।✔ আরামদায়ক গ্রিপ – সহজে ধরার জন্য উপযোগী ডিজাইন।✔ ক্রিস্টাল ক্লিয়ার স্বচ্ছতা – পানীয়কে আরও আকর্ষণীয় করে তোলে।✔ ৬-পিসের সেট – পরিবারের দৈনন্দিন ব্যবহার বা অতিথি আপ্যায়নের জন্য পারফেক্ট।এই ৮-কোণা গ্লাস সেট আপনার ডাইনিং ও রান্নাঘরের জন্য এক অনন্য সংযোজন!Crystal Clear 8-Angle Coke Glass Set – Durable & Stylish DrinkwareUpgrade your glassware collection with this distinctive 8-angle coke glass set, designed for both elegance and everyday functionality. Made from high-quality glass, these crystal-clear drinking glasses offer durability and a sleek, modern look. Whether you're enjoying a refreshing beverage at home or serving guests, this set is the perfect addition to your kitchen or dining space.Product Highlights:✔ Premium Glass Material – Crafted from high-quality glass for long-lasting durability.✔ Unique 8-Angle Design – Enhances the aesthetic appeal of your table setting.✔ Crystal Clear Transparency – Showcases your drinks beautifully.✔ Versatile Usage – Ideal for water, juice, soft drinks, and more.✔ Perfect for Daily Use – Designed for comfort and easy handling.✔ Elegant & Stylish – A sophisticated addition to any glassware collection.This 8-angle coke glass set is a must-have for anyone looking to add a touch of elegance and functionality to their drinkware!

Model:w.47.Crystal Highball Glasses for various drinks. • Perfect for water, juice, beer, wine, and cocktails. • Special Edition Glassware Set for any occasion. • Dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. • Leak-resistant design for worry-free use. • Ideal for everyday use with a service size of 300. • High-quality glassware with a model number of w.47.<style> pre { white-space: pre-wrap; } </style>This Crystal Highball Glass Drinking Glass set is perfect for any occasion. With a set of 6, you'll have plenty of glasses for water, juice, beer, wine, and cocktails. The special edition glassware set is made of high-quality crystal, ensuring durability and a beautiful shine. The glasses are dishwasher safe and leak-resistant, making them easy to clean and perfect for everyday use. Whether you're hosting a dinner party or enjoying a drink with friends, these glasses are sure to impress.

product_title: Viva Tumbler 420ml (Single Pcs) 6315

detail.name: Viva Tumbler 420ml (Single Pcs) 6315

details.description_text: Brand: Ocean Origin: Thailand Model: 6315 Material: Glass Capacity: 420 ml (14 oz) Set Includes: 01 Pcs Weight: 435 g Size: TD-70mm, BD-80mm, MD-80mm, H-240mm Colour: Transparent Warranty: N/AViva Tumbler 420ml Single Pcs – 6315Brand: Ocean Origin: Thailand Model: 6315 Material: Glass Capacity: 420 ml (14 oz) Set Includes: Single Pcs Weight: 435 g Size: TD-70mm, BD-80mm, MD-80mm, H-240mm Colour: Transparent Warranty: N/AProduct Features:Premium Quality Glass: Made from durable soda-lime glass, the Viva Tumbler set is hygienic, safe, and ideal for daily use.Generous Capacity: With a 420ml capacity (14 oz), these tumblers are perfect for a variety of beverages such as water, juices, cocktails, or even beer.Dishwasher & Refrigerator Safe: Convenient for everyday use, these tumblers are safe to use in both the dishwasher and refrigerator, ensuring ease of maintenance.Clear & Elegant Design: The transparent design provides a sleek and modern look that fits well with any table setting, enhancing your drinking experience.Durable & Heat Resistant: The Viva Tumblers feature a heat and scratch-resistant design, ensuring long-lasting durability for both everyday and special occasions.Professional-Grade Quality: Trusted by food service professionals, Ocean glassware is known for its high-quality and durable products, making this tumbler set a reliable addition to your kitchen.Why Buy This Product? 🍹 Versatile and Stylish: The Viva Tumbler set is perfect for a range of beverages, whether it's for casual sipping or special occasions. 🍹 Durable & Long-Lasting: Crafted from premium soda-lime glass, these tumblers are built to last, maintaining their clear, elegant appearance with regular use. 🍹 Convenient Maintenance: Safe for dishwasher and refrigerator use, offering practicality in busy households. 🍹 Trusted Brand: Ocean Glassware is a leading name in Asia, known for providing high-quality products that are trusted by professionals worldwide.Add the Viva Tumbler 420ml Single Pcs to your glassware collection for a blend of style, functionality, and lasting durability!
